mapper.insert: insert into ${prefix}_run_processinstance (ID, PROCESSDEFINITION_ID, PROCESSDEFINITION_KEY, SUBJECT, START_TIME, END_TIME, DEFINITION_ID, ROOTTOKEN_ID, BIZ_KEY, INITIATOR, START_AUTHOR, ISSUSPENDED, PARENT_ID, PARENT_TOKEN_ID, UPDATE_TIME, PROCESSLOCATION, INSTANCE_STATUS, ARCHIVE_TIME,REV_,TENANT_ID,INSTTYPE,PROCESSDEFINITION_NAME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDefinitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDefinitionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{definitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rootTokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initiator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSuspended,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentTokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instanceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},1,${appId}, #{instType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processDefinitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.sql: ID, PROCESSDEFINITION_ID, PROCESSDEFINITION_KEY, SUBJECT, START_TIME, END_TIME, DEFINITION_ID, ROOTTOKEN_ID, BIZ_KEY, INITIATOR, START_AUTHOR, ISSUSPENDED, PARENT_ID, PARENT_TOKEN_ID, UPDATE_TIME, PROCESSLOCATION, INSTANCE_STATUS, ARCHIVE_TIME,REV_,TENANT_ID,INSTTYPE,PROCESSDEFINITION_NAME
mapper.update: update ${prefix}_run_processinstance set PROCESSDEFINITION_ID = #{processDefinitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESSDEFINITION_KEY = #{processDefinitionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEFINITION_ID = #{definitionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROOTTOKEN_ID = #{rootTokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIZ_KEY = #{bizKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INITIATOR = #{initiator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_AUTHOR = #{startAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSUSPENDED = #{isSuspended,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_TOKEN_ID = #{parentTokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROCESSLOCATION = #{processLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSTANCE_STATUS = #{instanceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARCHIVE_TIME = #{archiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REV_ = #{revisionNext,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TENANT_ID=${appId},PROCESSDEFINITION_NAME=#{processDefinitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REV_ = #{revision,jdbcType=INTEGER}
